name: Slime Crystals
description:
Meet the fantasy staple - slime

Slime Crystals lets you act as a duplicating slime which has powers to activate crystals!

Features

-You are a slime

-You can split yourself

-You can control all copies of your selves to solve puzzles

-Has 5 hand crafted levels, each with unique solutions

-Enough enjoyment to last at least half a nokia worth of power.
